skills.name: Untrackable Silhouette (纏わない姿)
text:
During battle, every time the enemy fleet prepares a [Main Battery Salvo], Volta's Speed increases by 100% and reduces damage taken by 50%, lasts 3 seconds.
This skill has a 5s CD, can only proc 6 times per battle.

skills.name: Revolutionary Modification (常識を覆す改良)
text: Can equip up to 3 Main Battery.
During battle, [Shelling] is increased by 15% of Volta's [Shelling] and equipment [Shelling] stats.

skills.name: Mastercraft Ship (匠の傑作)
text:
During battle, increases Crit Rate of first 2 [Main Battery Salvo] by 100%, will use the T-Adv damage modifier regardless of engagement type.
If a ship is sunk during these 2 salvo, instantly reloads [Main Battery].
